channel.title: How do i make mithril dragon attackable? 317
channel.description: Im on a 317 and my mithril dragons are not attackable and i really need them to be, i guess it would be in the npchandler, but i have no idea what to add in or anything. Can some please give me instructions on how to make the mith drags attackable. thanks

item.title: How do i make mithril dragon attackable? 317
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Add them in npc.cfg
